termtel.widgets.qtssh_widget module

class termtel.widgets.qtssh_widget.Ui_Terminal(connect_info, parent=None)[source]

Bases: QWidget

Terminal class extending QWidget to enable SSH connections in a Qt widget.

check_terminal_ready()[source]

Check if the terminal is ready, retry if not.

cleanup()[source]

Cleanup method to properly close the terminal and free resources. Called when the terminal tab is being closed.
